Browse the source code of codebrowser/source/externals/clhep/include/CLHEP/Vector/ThreeVector.icc

1// -*- C++ -*-
2// ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
3//
4// This file is a part of the CLHEP - a Class Library for High Energy Physics.
5//
6// This is the definitions of the inline member functions of the
7// Hep3Vector class.
8//
9
10#include <cmath>
11
12namespace CLHEP {
13
14// ------------------
15// Access to elements
16// ------------------
17
18// x, y, z
19
20inline double & Hep3Vector::operator[] (int i) { return operator()(i); }
21inline double Hep3Vector::operator[] (int i) const { return operator()(i); }
22
23inline double Hep3Vector::x() const { return dx; }
24inline double Hep3Vector::y() const { return dy; }
25inline double Hep3Vector::z() const { return dz; }
26
27inline double Hep3Vector::getX() const { return dx; }
28inline double Hep3Vector::getY() const { return dy; }
29inline double Hep3Vector::getZ() const { return dz; }
30
31inline void Hep3Vector::setX(double x1) { dx = x1; }
32inline void Hep3Vector::setY(double y1) { dy = y1; }
33inline void Hep3Vector::setZ(double z1) { dz = z1; }
34
35inline void Hep3Vector::set(double x1, double y1, double z1) {
36 dx = x1;
37 dy = y1;
38 dz = z1;
39}
40
41inline double Hep3Vector::operator () (int i) const {
42 switch(i) {
43 case X:
44 return x();
45 case Y:
46 return y();
47 case Z:
48 return z();
49 }
50 return 0.;
51}
52
53inline double & Hep3Vector::operator () (int i) {
54 static double dummy;
55 switch(i) {
56 case X:
57 return dx;
58 case Y:
59 return dy;
60 case Z:
61 return dz;
62 }
63 return dummy;
64}
65
66// --------------
67// Global methods
68// --------------
69
70inline Hep3Vector operator + (const Hep3Vector & a, const Hep3Vector & b) {
71 return Hep3Vector(a.x() + b.x(), a.y() + b.y(), a.z() + b.z());
72}
73
74inline Hep3Vector operator - (const Hep3Vector & a, const Hep3Vector & b) {
75 return Hep3Vector(a.x() - b.x(), a.y() - b.y(), a.z() - b.z());
76}
77
78inline Hep3Vector operator * (const Hep3Vector & p, double a) {
79 return Hep3Vector(a*p.x(), a*p.y(), a*p.z());
80}
81
82inline Hep3Vector operator * (double a, const Hep3Vector & p) {
83 return Hep3Vector(a*p.x(), a*p.y(), a*p.z());
84}
85
86inline double operator * (const Hep3Vector & a, const Hep3Vector & b) {
87 return a.dot(b);
88}
89
90// --------------------------
91// Set in various coordinates
92// --------------------------
93
94inline void Hep3Vector::setRThetaPhi
95 ( double r1, double theta1, double phi1 ) {
96 setSpherical (r1, theta1, phi1);
97}
98
99inline void Hep3Vector::setREtaPhi
100 ( double r1, double eta1, double phi1 ) {
101 setSpherical (r1, 2*std::atan(std::exp(-eta1)), phi1);
102}
103
104inline void Hep3Vector::setRhoPhiZ
105 ( double rho1, double phi1, double z1) {
106 setCylindrical (rho1, phi1, z1);
107}
108
109// ------------
110// Constructors
111// ------------
112
113inline Hep3Vector::Hep3Vector()
114 : dx(0.), dy(0.), dz(0.) {}
115inline Hep3Vector::Hep3Vector(double x1)
116 : dx(x1), dy(0.), dz(0.) {}
117inline Hep3Vector::Hep3Vector(double x1, double y1)
118 : dx(x1), dy(y1), dz(0.) {}
119inline Hep3Vector::Hep3Vector(double x1, double y1, double z1)
120 : dx(x1), dy(y1), dz(z1) {}
121
122inline Hep3Vector::Hep3Vector(const Hep3Vector & p)
123: dx(p.dx), dy(p.dy), dz(p.dz) {}
124
125inline Hep3Vector::~Hep3Vector() {}
126
127inline Hep3Vector & Hep3Vector::operator = (const Hep3Vector & p) {
128 dx = p.dx;
129 dy = p.dy;
130 dz = p.dz;
131 return *this;
132}
133
134// ------------------
135// Access to elements
136// ------------------
137
138// r, theta, phi
139
140inline double Hep3Vector::mag2() const { return dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz; }
141inline double Hep3Vector::mag() const { return std::sqrt(mag2()); }
142inline double Hep3Vector::r() const { return mag(); }
143
144inline double Hep3Vector::theta() const {
145 return dx == 0.0 && dy == 0.0 && dz == 0.0 ? 0.0 : std::atan2(perp(),dz);
146}
147inline double Hep3Vector::phi() const {
148 return dx == 0.0 && dy == 0.0 ? 0.0 : std::atan2(dy,dx);
149}
150
151inline double Hep3Vector::getR() const { return mag(); }
152inline double Hep3Vector::getTheta() const { return theta(); }
153inline double Hep3Vector::getPhi() const { return phi(); }
154inline double Hep3Vector::angle() const { return theta(); }
155
156inline double Hep3Vector::cosTheta() const {
157 double ptot = mag();
158 return ptot == 0.0 ? 1.0 : dz/ptot;
159}
160
161inline double Hep3Vector::cos2Theta() const {
162 double ptot2 = mag2();
163 return ptot2 == 0.0 ? 1.0 : dz*dz/ptot2;
164}
165
166inline void Hep3Vector::setR(double r1) { setMag(r1); }
167
168inline void Hep3Vector::setTheta(double th) {
169 double ma = mag();
170 double ph = phi();
171 setX(ma*std::sin(th)*std::cos(ph));
172 setY(ma*std::sin(th)*std::sin(ph));
173 setZ(ma*std::cos(th));
174}
175
176inline void Hep3Vector::setPhi(double ph) {
177 double xy = perp();
178 setX(xy*std::cos(ph));
179 setY(xy*std::sin(ph));
180}
181
182// perp, eta,
183
184inline double Hep3Vector::perp2() const { return dx*dx + dy*dy; }
185inline double Hep3Vector::perp() const { return std::sqrt(perp2()); }
186inline double Hep3Vector::rho() const { return perp(); }
187inline double Hep3Vector::eta() const { return pseudoRapidity();}
188
189inline double Hep3Vector::getRho() const { return perp(); }
190inline double Hep3Vector::getEta() const { return pseudoRapidity();}
191
192inline void Hep3Vector::setPerp(double r1) {
193 double p = perp();
194 if (p != 0.0) {
195 dx *= r1/p;
196 dy *= r1/p;
197 }
198}
199inline void Hep3Vector::setRho(double rho1) { setPerp (rho1); }
200
201// ----------
202// Comparison
203// ----------
204
205inline bool Hep3Vector::operator == (const Hep3Vector& v) const {
206 return (v.x()==x() && v.y()==y() && v.z()==z()) ? true : false;
207}
208
209inline bool Hep3Vector::operator != (const Hep3Vector& v) const {
210 return (v.x()!=x() || v.y()!=y() || v.z()!=z()) ? true : false;
211}
212
213inline double Hep3Vector::getTolerance () {
214 return tolerance;
215}
216
217// ----------
218// Arithmetic
219// ----------
220
221inline Hep3Vector& Hep3Vector::operator += (const Hep3Vector & p) {
222 dx += p.x();
223 dy += p.y();
224 dz += p.z();
225 return *this;
226}
227
228inline Hep3Vector& Hep3Vector::operator -= (const Hep3Vector & p) {
229 dx -= p.x();
230 dy -= p.y();
231 dz -= p.z();
232 return *this;
233}
234
235inline Hep3Vector Hep3Vector::operator - () const {
236 return Hep3Vector(-dx, -dy, -dz);
237}
238
239inline Hep3Vector& Hep3Vector::operator *= (double a) {
240 dx *= a;
241 dy *= a;
242 dz *= a;
243 return *this;
244}
245
246// -------------------
247// Combine two Vectors
248// -------------------
249
250inline double Hep3Vector::diff2(const Hep3Vector & p) const {
251 return (*this-p).mag2();
252}
253
254inline double Hep3Vector::dot(const Hep3Vector & p) const {
255 return dx*p.x() + dy*p.y() + dz*p.z();
256}
257
258inline Hep3Vector Hep3Vector::cross(const Hep3Vector & p) const {
259 return Hep3Vector(dy*p.z()-p.y()*dz, dz*p.x()-p.z()*dx, dx*p.y()-p.x()*dy);
260}
261
262inline double Hep3Vector::perp2(const Hep3Vector & p) const {
263 double tot = p.mag2();
264 double ss = dot(p);
265 return tot > 0.0 ? mag2()-ss*ss/tot : mag2();
266}
267
268inline double Hep3Vector::perp(const Hep3Vector & p) const {
269 return std::sqrt(perp2(p));
270}
271
272inline Hep3Vector Hep3Vector::perpPart () const {
273 return Hep3Vector (dx, dy, 0);
274}
275inline Hep3Vector Hep3Vector::project () const {
276 return Hep3Vector (0, 0, dz);
277}
278
279inline Hep3Vector Hep3Vector::perpPart (const Hep3Vector & v2) const {
280 return ( *this - project(v2) );
281}
282
283inline double Hep3Vector::angle(const Hep3Vector & q) const {
284 return std::acos(cosTheta(q));
285}
286
287inline double Hep3Vector::theta(const Hep3Vector & q) const {
288 return angle(q);
289}
290
291inline double Hep3Vector::azimAngle(const Hep3Vector & v2) const {
292 return deltaPhi(v2);
293}
294
295// ----------
296// Properties
297// ----------
298
299inline Hep3Vector Hep3Vector::unit() const {
300 double tot = mag2();
301 Hep3Vector p(x(),y(),z());
302 return tot > 0.0 ? p *= (1.0/std::sqrt(tot)) : p;
303}
304
305inline Hep3Vector Hep3Vector::orthogonal() const {
306 double xx = dx < 0.0 ? -dx : dx;
307 double yy = dy < 0.0 ? -dy : dy;
308 double zz = dz < 0.0 ? -dz : dz;
309 if (xx < yy) {
310 return xx < zz ? Hep3Vector(0,dz,-dy) : Hep3Vector(dy,-dx,0);
311 }else{
312 return yy < zz ? Hep3Vector(-dz,0,dx) : Hep3Vector(dy,-dx,0);
313 }
314}
315
316} // namespace CLHEP
